metadata.title: President lauds security forces for repulsing attack of Khawarij

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 13 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari Thursday lauded the security forces for repulsing the attack of Khawarij on their check post in Jandola. He appreciated the security forces for eliminating 10 Khawarij during the operation. He said the brave armed forces were carrying out successful operations for eradicating Fitna al-Khawarij. The President expressed determination to continue operations till complete elimination of terrorism. He said the whole nation stood with the security forces in the war against terrorism.
